data.actual_result: The Discord window remains in the background
data.short_description: When Discord is set to appear in 'All Desktops' it cannot be selected with Mission Control
data.steps_to_repro: - Have 2 Desktops open - Right click Discord on the Dock and select 'All Desktops' - Open a Discord window (and other windows) and attempt to select Discord's window in Mission Control
